events.name: Windows 8 Unleashed - Lexington KY
events.about:
Windows 8 Unleashed - Full Day of Hands-On Programming, B.Y.O. Laptop!

Windows 8 is here and this is an opportunity for developers to get hands experience by attending a “Windows 8 Unleashed” event in your region. Bring your friends and colleagues as we join together to kick-start Windows 8 development in the bluegrass on January 8th! “Windows 8 Unleashed” is a series of FREE events run by your local community friends and leaders, and are great whether you are an experienced .NET developer, or even if you are just getting started. We’ll spend the morning in lecture and hands on labs. Half way through, you’ll get a chance to take what you learned in the morning and compete in a hackathon with a chance to win some great prizes!

Required Software and Downloads

Please make sure to get the required software and downloads BEFORE coming to the event. You can find everything you need on the “Windows 8 Unleashed Installs” page.

Agenda

Session I – Overview

  • Metro Style Apps Overview
  • Developing Metro Style Apps
  • Working with Controls
  • Implementing Navigation 

Session II – Location and Data

  • Working with Location
  • Data Binding
  • Roaming
  • App Bar 

Session III – Metro Principals

  • Live Tiles & Toast
  • Contracts
  • Full, Fill Snap and Portrait Views
  • Advertising

Build an App and Win Money and Prizes!

There are some awesome prizes available. Not only do you get a ton of information for FREE, but you have an opportunity to win some stuff! Dont miss this opportunity!

DAY-OF prizes will be awarded (from PDSA):

  • 1st Place: $500 Gift Card
  • 2nd Place: $200 Gift Card
  • 3rd Place: $100 Gift Card

“Best Overall App” Prizes will be awarded to the best app from ALL unleashed events:

  • $10,000 from Component Art
  • Windows 8 Tablet from PDSA, Inc.

In addition all attendees will receive a FREE eBook from O’Reilly

This event is being held in the University of Kentucky Student Center Ball Room, 3rd floor room 305A

Student Center Floor Plan map: http://www.uky.edu/studentcenter/maps

Parking is available in parking garage #5 across South Limestone from the student center. Campus Map with parking garage #5 and the Student Center Highlighted.

Dining options are available in the studnet center right next to the event along with a variety of other choices with in a 5 min walk from the student center on South Limestone and Avenue of Champions.  View the Student Center Dining options here: http://www.uky.edu/studentcenter/dining
